hero.heading1: Get to Know Who we are!
hero.para1: Join our 6-week program and learn the foundations of the product manager role. Learn how to understand customer problems, validate ideas, prioritize features and more.
hero.para2: Whether you're an aspiring product manager or leader, an entrepreneur, a team member that works with PMâ€™s or developers, our beginner-friendly course is designed to give you a solid foundation. In just six weeks, you'll learn the key skills of how to build great products and excel in this rewarding career.
